admin_qq.description: 管理员QQ号 (Admin QQ) - Please enter admin QQ numbers, separated by commas
admin_qq.hint: 请输入管理员的QQ号，多个请用英文逗号分隔 / Enter admin QQ numbers, separate multiple with commas

web_username.description: WebUI 登录用户名 (WebUI Username) - Username for accessing the permission management page
web_username.hint: 访问权限管理页面时使用的用户名 / Username for the WebUI login

web_password.description: WebUI 登录密码 (WebUI Password) - A random password will be generated on first startup, you can modify it here
web_password.hint: 首次启动会自动生成随机密码，您可在此修改 / A random password will be generated on first startup, you can change it here

web_host.description: WebUI 监听地址 (WebUI Host) - 127.0.0.1 for local access only, 0.0.0.0 for public access (less secure)
web_host.hint: 127.0.0.1 仅本地访问，0.0.0.0 允许公网访问（更不安全）/ 127.0.0.1 for local only, 0.0.0.0 for public access (less secure)

web_port.description: WebUI 监听端口 (WebUI Port) - Make sure the port is not occupied
web_port.hint: 请确保端口未被占用 / Make sure the port is not in use
